attributes.additional_details: It’s just too expensive for everyone.
attributes.background: TFL services are too expensive and when you have to get on a bus every day it costs more than filling a car up with petrol. People rely on these services to get to work and appointments. It needs to be cheaper.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about TfL services are a matter for Transport for London, not the UK Government or Parliament.
